Hello, I'm Kieran Pritchard

I am a student at Bournemouth and Poole College, currently studying a Digital Foundation T-Level. I am also passionate about programming and cybersecurity, and I aspire to pursue a career in the latter.

Learn More

About Me

I am a hardworking and motivated individual who takes a reliable and organized approach to work. Determined to reach the goals ahead, I do whatever is necessary to achieve them—whether that means learning independently in my own time or gaining experience through hands-on practice.

How I Started Programming

This blog post is a reflection on the beginning of my programming journey. I wanted to share with you how I got started, how I began learning, and offer some personal tips and advice for anyone looking to start their own path in programming.
